productDetails:
To ensure the longevity of the exterior coat, we strongly advise following the care instructions provided, which include washing the item inside out using a gentle cycle with cold water and air drying.
73% polyester, 27% spandex
Machine wash cold
Do not bleach
Do not tumble dry
Do not iron
Imported.
sizeAndFit:
7/8 - 25" inseam
Smooth elastic band in the high waistband for stay-put power
Soft second skin feel
Moisture wicking properties
Fit is true-to-size but is intentionally very compressive
4-way stretch ensures freedom of movement
Non-see-through fabric (squat proof)
